themes: importance of cultural funding for arts and culture
challenge of securing recurring funding for ongoing projects
need for longer-term support for annual events
balance between funding new and existing projects
key_phrases: how vital these programs are for arts and culture in Austin
securing consistent access to funding for a consistent project
my project Babestock Music Festival is an annually reoccurring event
not being able to apply for a grant 2 years in a row
losing points for being a previous grant recipient
some projects require funding for a longer period of time before becoming stable
barriers_identified: inability to apply for a grant two years in a row
penalization for being a previous grant recipient
lack of consistent funding for recurring projects
solutions_proposed: allow funding for longer periods for projects that need time to become stable
consider ongoing support for annually recurring events
